definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: No suspected cancer cells or cancer cells were found.
sentences.chinese: 宫颈刮片检查两组均未查见可疑癌细胞或癌细胞。

sentences.english: No suspected cancer cells or cancer cells were found.
sentences.chinese: 宫颈刮片检查两组均未查见可疑癌细胞或癌细胞。

sentences.english: These results suggest that pathway which cancer cells entered lymphatics was mainly by destructing walls of lymphatics.
sentences.chinese: 提示癌细胞进入淋巴管的途径以破坏管壁为主。

sentences.english: Following the Games, Shanteau returned home and had surgery to remove the cancerous growth.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会之后，尚托回家了手术切除癌细胞的增长。

sentences.english: The cells may also lose or inactivate the tumor suppressor gene PTEN.
sentences.chinese: 癌细胞也可能甩掉或关闭肿瘤抑制基因PTEN。

sentences.english: Lipoprotein with higher titer of SCSP showed higher killing ability on cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: SCSP的含量高，则对癌细胞的杀伤作用强。

sentences.english: Can cancer cell be in the parasitism of which a few place of human body?
sentences.chinese: 癌细胞能在人体的哪几个部位寄生？

sentences.english: Doctors found cancer cell in the section.
sentences.chinese: 医生在切片上发现了癌细胞。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism and significance of formation of cytoplasmic desmosomes in carcinoma cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨癌细胞胞质桥粒及其形成的机制和意义。

sentences.english: Cancer cells release gastrin mainly with secretion granules.
sentences.chinese: 癌细胞形成分泌颗粒释放胃泌素。

sentences.english: The results indicate that cis-DDP can react with tumor cell membrane proteins.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明顺铂能与癌细胞膜结合。

sentences.english: Blebbing is important in a variety of cellular processes.
sentences.chinese: 起泡是癌细胞形成中非常关键的一步。

sentences.english: When someone has a primary cancer tumor, a small number of cancer cells circulates through the bloodstream.
sentences.chinese: 当患者具有原发癌时，小量的癌细胞进入血流循环。

sentences.english: Continual ingestion of microwaved food causes immune system deficiencies through lymph gland and blood serum alterations.
sentences.chinese: 长期使用微波食物导致人体血液中的癌细胞的增加。

sentences.english: I know that it’s traveled to the liver and my lungs.
sentences.chinese: 我知道癌细胞已经扩散到我的肾脏还有肺部了。

sentences.english: Gastrin positive granules scattered in cytoplasm of cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 胃泌素阳性颗粒弥漫分布于癌细胞浆。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
